definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: My lord, you are departing, and who shall feed this people?
sentences.chinese: 我的主，你将要离世，谁牧羊这民呢？

sentences.english: Several people reminisced about the deaths of their own childhood pets.
sentences.chinese: 很多人在他们的来信中回忆自己童年时宠物的离世。

sentences.english: Consider how you want to be remembered after you are gone.
sentences.chinese: 考虑下在你想怎样在离世之后被别人记住。

sentences.english: Two people had to die for me to see the truth - Jesus and my mom.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣和母亲的离世让我看到了生命的真相。

sentences.english: But in death she has finally gotten the chance.
sentences.chinese: 离世后她终于抓住了机会。

sentences.english: He has buried nine spouses, and divorced another dozen, the Times said.
sentences.chinese: 他有9位妻子已经离世，并和另外12位妻子离婚。

sentences.english: Prince's sudden death is a great loss in the world of music.
sentences.chinese: 普林斯的意外离世是全球音乐界的重大损失。

sentences.english: Lewis and Davidman spent only four years together before Joy died of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 路易斯与乔伊只共度了四年岁月，乔伊即因癌症离世。

sentences.english: I have seen two of them die.
sentences.chinese: 我曾目睹他们当中两人的离世。

sentences.english: And of rainbow father die suddenly, jiang Yu had the suspicion of do violence again.
sentences.chinese: 而彩虹父亲的突然离世，江余又有了行凶的嫌疑。

sentences.english: Grieving is a natural human reaction to the loss of a pet.
sentences.chinese: 当宠物离世后，我们感到悲痛是一件自然的事情。

sentences.english: The priests of the Old Testament had to be replaced when they passed away.
sentences.chinese: 旧约的祭司当离世之后，便要由另一位祭司接替。

sentences.english: Moses gave three speeches to his people just before he died.
sentences.chinese: 摩西在离世前对以色列人说了三篇讲论。

sentences.english: He is survived by his wife, Laurene, and four children.
sentences.chinese: 他先于他的妻子劳伦尼和四个孩子离世。

sentences.english: His sudden death is a strange kind of victory.
sentences.chinese: 他的猝然离世亦是一种另类的胜利。

sentences.english: After Dad died, in 1991, I wanted to learn more about World War II.
sentences.chinese: 父亲于1991年离世，我想对二战做进一步的了解。

definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
to die/to depart from the world forever
to die/to depart this mortal coil
to live to the (ripe) age of
to die an untimely death (idiom)/to be cut off in one's prime
